0:
access_by_lua_block {
  local username = ngx.var.authentik_username
  local groups    = ngx.var.authentik_groups
  local required_usernames = ngx.var['required_usernames']
  local required_groups    = ngx.var['required_groups']
    local sep = '|'
  if (required_usernames ~= nil) then
    for required_username in string.gmatch(required_usernames, "([^"..sep.."]+)") do
      if string.match(username, required_username) then
        return;
      end
    end
  end
  if (required_groups ~= nil) then
    for group in string.gmatch(groups, "([^"..sep.."]+)") do
      for required_group in string.gmatch(required_groups, "([^"..sep.."]+)") do
        if string.match(group, required_group) then
          return;
        end
      end
    end
  end
  if (required_usernames ~= nil) or (required_groups ~= nil)  then
    ngx.exit(ngx.HTTP_FORBIDDEN);
  end
}

1:
[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

0:
[kubernetes]
driver = usbhid-ups
port = auto
desc = "American Power Conversion Back-UPS BE900G3"
1:
[ups.cp1500]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR UPS"
  vendorid = 0764
  productid = 0501
  serial = ${UPS_SERIAL_0}
[ups.cp1500lcd]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower PR1500LCDRT2U UPS"
  vendorid = 0764
  productid = 0601
  serial = ${UPS_SERIAL_1}

DEADTIME 25
MAXAGE 25
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

  static_configs:
  - targets:
    - nas.home:9290
- job_name: 'node-exporter'
  static_configs:
  - targets:
    - opnsense.home:9100
    - nas.home:9100
- job_name: 'smartctl'
  metrics_path: '/metrics'
  static_configs:

    - nas.home:9633
